name: Mr. Jetpack +
description:
This is a remake of the first game I ever made.

Your goal is still the same, which is too survive the blobs as long as possible. However, now you can do it with the updated looks, the long requested timer, and more.

I made everything in this game except for the music that was made by Cratlemungus, which you can access here: (Link not yet available)

(When I get around to it I will make a downloadable version)

Good luck surviving and competing with your friends for the best time.
